name: C04-F00-S01-05 internal oldap user with valid credential can access idm service

testSteps.description: Given post request to login with: falcon, {123456}
And get request "/idm-service/api/scim/organizations/ITSMA/configurations/ITSMAIdmLdapConfiguration1" with falcon's token

Then entryset in entry {root} should be:
［|displayName|baseDn         |userId                  |configurationType |name                      |
|ITSMALDAP  |dc=itsma,dc=com|cn=admin,dc=itsma,dc=com|LDAP_CONFIGURATION|ITSMAIdmLdapConfiguration1|］
